description:
Posting: Hi there my name is Maxwell. I'm hoping to find a house sitter working in The Bronx, New York. I aim to chat with a capable, talented individual who has one-off availability. Service Requirements: My family requires help with plant watering, mail collecting, and snow clearing. Ideally, you have experience training pets. The best-possible housesitter would have previous experience however this is not necessary to apply. Other Availability: We can likely work around your schedule. How To Apply: Shoot me a message and I'll try to get back shortly!

Services

    <li>Take Out Trash/Recycling</li>
title: House Sitter
